Blatto.name: Blatto
Blatto.desc: Annoying little roach that tends to swarm in packs. They are weak yet resilient, and can be dangerous in large numbers.

Average Joe.name: Average Joe
Average Joe.desc: Jack of all trades, master of none.

FishBat.name: FishBat
FishBat.desc: A large, ugly beast of a fish with bat wings, surprisingly agile for its size. Not to be confused with a batfish.

Joyama.name: Joyama
Joyama.desc: A large, spider-like creature with a nasty bite.

Rootwraith.name: Rootwraith
Rootwraith.desc: A horrid mass of roots and vines. It is slow but powerful.

Blightfruit Beast.name: Blightfruit Beast
Blightfruit Beast.desc: A large, mutated fruit with a gaping maw. The toxins from its flesh seem to have been transferred to its attitude instead.

Scorchling.name: Scorchling
Scorchling.desc: A small, fiery insectoid that moves quickly and can unleash bursts of flame. They travel in packs and are suspected by many to be controlled by a hive mind.

Murmurant.name: Murmurant
Murmurant.desc: A gangly creature that moves with an unsettling grace. Beware of its song, as it can cause confusion and disorientation.

Virex.name: Virex
Virex.desc: Bulky, feral scavengers that lurk around the wasteland. Very dangerous if they catch you off guard.
